attributes.action: create a statue of Mikey Franklin in Trafalgar Square
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mikey Franklin has just started his own personality cult, which is fast gaining support around the country.

The people of Britain deserve to be able show their appreciation of Mikey in a public place. Therefore, we ask that a statue of Mikey is put up in Trafalgar Square, where he can be seen from far and wide

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
